Smart Thermos: Create a thermos that can detect the temperature of the surrounding environment and adjust its insulation accordingly. This smart thermos can be controlled through an app on your phone, allowing you to adjust the temperature of your drink to your liking.

Personalized Thermos: Develop a thermos that can recognize and display the name and image of the user. This personalized thermos can be a unique gift item and can also help to prevent accidental pick-ups by others.

Thermos with Built-In Water Filter: Create a thermos with a built-in water filter that can remove impurities and contaminants from the water you drink. This can be especially useful for people who travel to areas with questionable water quality.

Thermos with Heating and Cooling Functions: Develop a thermos that can both heat and cool your drink. This would be ideal for people who prefer their drinks at different temperatures throughout the day.

Thermos with a Built-In Battery: Create a thermos with a built-in battery that can charge your phone or other devices. This would be a convenient and eco-friendly way to keep your devices charged on the go.
